attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unemployment benefit should be scrapped and instead all people who find themselves out of work should be either put to work by the local authorities clearing public parks and pathways etc... or have to undertake job seekers training. The money currently paid in benefit for the unemployed will still be paid but only if the person has attended one of the above for a full week. The only exception to this is those who have a legitimate illness.
